title: My new client isn't working
body: I updates the game for the new client and i press launch and nothing happens i tried to reinstall the game and it didn't work

replies.body: I left a comment on another page but long story short go to C drive (located in my documents, my computer), locate riot games folder, then into League of Legends folder, locate the file "LeagueClient" and if there's a messed up symbol or says error when you try to double left click on that DELETE IT. Then, a few files down is "lol.launcher" click that and it should run to the client, hit the LAUNCH button then it will do it's update. GOODLUCK!

You might be having a permissions issue when trying to start the update. When you press launch, the patcher tries to start the update but your OS thinks it's bad and stops it from loading. Follow the steps [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get that update going.

[Granting League permission to run on your computer should ensure a successful launch.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Ignore my previous post as I've been provided with new information. (Thanks Broporo)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
